field.name: cdrag
field.long_name: Drag coefficient for LE and SH

field.name: cdrag_pft
field.long_name: Drag coefficient for LE and SH for PFT

field.name: asoilcol
field.long_name: Availability of data for the soil color interpolation (negative values if no data found)

field.name: aalb_bg
field.long_name: Availability of data for the albedo interpolation from MODIS related data-set (negative values if no data found)

field.name: atext
field.long_name: Availability of data for the soil texture interpolation (negative values if no data found)

field.name: areftemp
field.long_name: Availability of data for the reftemp interpolation (negative values if no data found)

field.name: alaimap
field.long_name: Availability of data for the lai interpolation (negative values if no data found)

field.name: reinf_slope
field.long_name: Slope index for each grid box

field.name: aslope
field.long_name: Availability of data for the slope interpolation (negative values if no data found)

field.name: evapnu_soil
field.long_name: Bare soil evap for soil type

field.name: tot_melt
field.long_name: Total melt from ice and snow

field.name: soilcap
field.long_name: Surface heat capacity considering snow and soil surface

field.name: frac_snow
field.long_name: Snow fraction on total area including snow on vegetation and nobio

field.name: frac_snow_nobio
field.long_name: Snow fraction on no vegeted area

field.name: aveget
field.long_name: Availability of data for the vegetation fraction interpolation (negative values if no data found)

field.name: aveget5k
field.long_name: Availability of data for the Olson vegetation fraction interpolation (negative values if no data found)

field.name: frac_bare
field.long_name: Bare soil fraction for each PFT

field.name: dss
field.long_name: Depth of dry soil in top reservoir

field.name: mrsos
field.long_name: Moisture in top 10cm (6 top soil layers with CWRR)

field.name: gpp
field.long_name: Net assimilation of carbon by the vegetation

field.name: diffevap
field.long_name: Difference betwence vevapp and composing fluxes in enerbil

field.name: vbeta4_pft
field.long_name: Beta for bare soil each pft

field.name: humrel
field.long_name: Soil moisture stress for transpiration (it is not the relative humidity)

field.name: residualFrac
field.long_name: Fraction of Grid Cell that is Land but Neither Vegetation-Covered nor Bare Soil

field.name: PAR
field.long_name: Photosynthetic active radiation, half of swdown

field.name: coszang
field.long_name: Cosine of the solar zenith angle

field.name: achem_wrice
field.long_name: Availability of data for the rice fertilizers interpolation (negative values if no data found)

field.name: achem_other
field.long_name: Availability of data for the other crops fertilizers interpolation (negative values if no data found)

field.name: achem_co2
field.long_name: Availability of data for the co2 bbg interpolation (negative values if no data found)

field.name: SoilSat
field.long_name: Mean volumetric water content at saturation

field.name: water2infilt
field.long_name: Storage of surface runoff kept for future infiltration(already included in humtot)

field.name: turfac
field.long_name: soil water stress for crop phenology

field.name: swfac
field.long_name: soil water stress for crop phenology

field.name: basinmap
field.long_name: Aproximate map of the river basins

field.name: nbrivers
field.long_name: Number or rivers in the outflow grid box

field.name: mask_coast
field.long_name: Mask of coastal gridcell which can recieve coastalflow

field.name: lake_overflow
field.long_name: Water overflow when lake reservoir exceeds maximum capacity

field.name: lake_overflow_coast
field.long_name: Water overflow when lake reservoir exceeds maximum capacity distributed on coast grid cells

field.name: delfastr
field.long_name: Accumulated storage change for fast flow reservoir

field.name: delfastr_daily
field.long_name: Mean of storage change in fast flow reservoir accumulated over each day

field.name: delslowr
field.long_name: Accumulated storage change for slow flow reservoir

field.name: delslowr_daily
field.long_name: Mean of storage change for slow flow reservoir accumulated over each day

field.name: delstreamr
field.long_name: Accumulated storage change for stream flow reservoir

field.name: delstreamr_daily
field.long_name: Mean of storage change in stream flow reservoir accumulated each day

field.name: dellakevol
field.long_name: Accumulated storage change for lake reservoir

field.name: dellakevol_daily
field.long_name: Mean of storage change for lake reservoir accumulated each day

field.name: delpondr
field.long_name: Accumulated storage change for ponds reservoir

field.name: delpondr_daily
field.long_name: Mean of storage change for ponds reservoir accumulated over each day

field.name: delfloodr
field.long_name: Accumulated storage change for floodplains reservoir

field.name: delfloodr_daily
field.long_name: Mean of storage change for floodplains reservoir accumulated over each day

field.name: delstock_routing
field.long_name: Mean of storage change in all routing reservoirs accumulated each day

field_group.field: delstreamr_daily + delfastr_daily + delslowr_daily + delfloodr_daily + delpondr_daily + dellaker_daily

field.name: wbr_fast
field.long_name: Water budget residu of the fast reservoir

field.name: wbr_slow

field.long_name: Water budget residu of the stream reservoir

field.name: wbr_lake
field.long_name: Water budget residu of the lake reservoir

field.name: riversret
field.long_name: Water flow return from lakes and swamps into the soil

field.long_name: Accumulated change in surface layer heat

field.name: DelColdCont
field.long_name: Accumulated change in snow surface layer cold content

field.name: Qsb_corrnum
field.long_name: Adjustement flux added to drainage (numerical errors in tridiag)

field.name: DelSoilMoist
field.long_name: Accumulated change in soil moisture (grid-cell total)

field.name: DelSoilMoist_daily
field.long_name: Change in soil moisture acumulated over each day (grid-cell total)

field.name: DelIntercept
field.long_name: Accumulated change in interception storage (grid-cell total)

field.name: DelIntercept_daily
field.long_name: Change in interception storage accumulated over each day

field.name: DelSWE
field.long_name: Accumulated change in Snow Water Equivalent (grid-cell total)

field.name: DelSWE_daily
field.long_name: Change in Snow Water Equivalent accumulated over each day

field.name: undermcr
field.long_name: Number of soiltiles under residual moisture

field.name: check_tr
field.long_name: check water conservation of tridiag with diag_tr2

field.name: Qs_corr
field.long_name: Adjustement flux added to surface runoff

field.name: Qs_corr2
field.long_name: Adjustement flux added to surface runoff (case of negative surface runoff)

field.name: Qforce
field.long_name: Adjustement flux added to drainage to sustain a forced water table depth

field.name: profil_froz_hydro
field.long_name: Frozen fraction for each hydrological soil layer average over soil types

field.name: ONSET_DATE
field.long_name: The day in the year when leaves start to grow

field.name: MAXFPC_LASTYEAR
field.long_name: Foliage projective cover of last year

field.name: CO2_TAKEN
field.long_name: CO2 taken from atmosphere for initiate growth

field.name: TOTAL_BM_LITTER
field.long_name: total conversion of biomass to litter

field.name: DEADLEAF_COVER
field.long_name: fraction of soil covered by dead leaves

field.name: BM_ALLOC_SAP_AB
field.long_name: biomass allocated to sapwood above ground

field.name: BM_ALLOC_SAP_BE
field.long_name: biomass allocated to sapwood below ground

field.long_name: annual release from all 10 year wood product pools

field.name: CFLUX_PROD100
field.long_name: annual release from all 100 year wood product pools

field.name: FIREDEATH
field.long_name: Fraction of plants killed by fire

field.name: LIGHT_DEATH
field.long_name: Fraction of plants that dies (light competition)

field.name: NCD_DORMANCE
field.long_name: Number of chilling days, since leaves were lost

field.name: ALLOW_INITPHENO
field.long_name: Allow to declare beginning of the growing season

field.name: BEGIN_LEAVES
field.long_name: Signal to start putting leaves on

field.name: LITTER_MET_NAVAIL
field.long_name: Metabolic litter not available for grazing

field.long_name: Metabolic litter available fraction for grazing

field.long_name: counter for soil dry enough for grazing

field.name: METHANE
field.long_name: C in enteric fermentation CH4 emission

field.name: IMPORT_YIELD
field.long_name: potential annual harvest yield of grassland

field.name: NB_GRAZINGDAYS
field.long_name: number of days that animal grazing on grassland

field.name: OUTSIDE_FOOD
field.long_name: feedstuff required from outside of system (e.g., crops or residuals)

field.name: CINPUT_GM
field.long_name: organic carbon input to managed grassland

field.name: AFTER_SNOW
field.long_name: days before allowing grazing after snow melt

field.name: AFTER_WET
field.long_name: days before allowing grazing after wet soil

field.long_name: the 1st day with wet soil in the past five days

field.name: WET2DAY
field.long_name: the 2nd day with wet soil in the past five days
